title: Rust's Rapid Rise: Foundation Fuels Language Growth
author: Darryl K Taft
description: The Rust Foundation's latest report highlights significant strides in language development, security initiatives, and ecosystem improvements, showcasing Rust's growing influence in the programming world.
cntitle: Rust 的快速崛起：基础推动语言发展
cndescription: Rust 基金会最新报告重点介绍了语言开发、安全计划和生态系统改进方面的重大进展，展示了 Rust 在编程世界中日益增长的影响力。
